page.original:
&ltOBJECT>.QUERY_BY_TABLE() Syntax &ltOBJECT>.QUERY_BY_TABLE() Description The &ltOBJECT>.QUERY_BY_TABLE() method applies to:
Browses (for &ltOBJECT> use either the &ltBROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for &ltOBJECT> use either the &ltFORM> pointer or the name of the form) The &ltOBJECT>.QUERY_BY_TABLE() method opens the Query by Table dialog. Limitations Desktop applications only. See Also Form Functions and Methods, Browse Functions and Methods
